name: Miconcierge S.A.P.I. DE C.V.
description: Developer of a hospitality tool designed to assist businesses in earning money by recommending and selling tourism services. The company's tool collates all necessary information to sell, schedule locations, events, and offers, and provide an update about the clients through an application, enabling businesses to expand, earn commissions, and reserve places for their clients.
one_liner: Developer of a hospitality tool designed to assist businesses in earning money by recommending and selling tourism services. The company's tool collates all necessary information to sell, schedule locations, events, and offers, and provide an update about the clients through an application, enabling businesses to expand, earn commissions, and reserve places for their clients.
